title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 611.7 - References
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 611.7 - References

State Regulations
(a) The following
materials have been referenced in this Part: New York State Water Quality

Accident Contingency Plan and Handbook, 1977, New York State Department of

Environmental Conservation, 625 Broadway, Albany, NY 12233. (b) The materials referenced above are
available for copying and inspection at the Department of Environmental

Conservation, Division of Water, 625 Broadway, Albany, NY 12233. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
611.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
